title: Can a spiritual healer predict about the future?
description: Answer (1 of 2): When you got an ability to see your entire life at once,not entire life but you right from the beginning, then your neck is bended downwards with shame and you start feeling like an offender. While living life in thirds dimension, we don't have prediction about future. But after...
